title: New: Foster The People – Helena Beat (Com Truise)
content:
After hearing that dreadful Pumped Up Pricks track by LA’s Foster The People, I swore to never listen to any of their music ever again.

Therefore, I haven’t actually heard the original version of this remix by beat-maestro Com Truise, but I’d imagine this reworked cut is far superior. Either way, Haley injects a much needed energy into FTP’s music, turning Helena Beat into a gyrating, foot-stomping dance number. Check out Com Truise’s remix of Helena Beat below.

Foster The People – Helena Beat (Com Truise Remix) by Com Truise
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
